flavorText: "Come, let me free you of the tyranny of thought."

foreignData.flavorText: „Komm her und lasse mich dich von der Tyrannei des Denkens befreien."
foreignData.name: Willenstäuscherin
foreignData.text: {T}: Übernimm die Kontrolle über eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, deren Stärke kleiner oder gleich der Anzahl der Kreaturen ist, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ven aquí, yo te liberaré de la tiranía del pensamiento."
foreignData.name: Seductora de voluntades
foreignData.text: {T}: Gana el control de la criatura objetivo con fuerza menor o igual que la cantidad de criaturas que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Viens, que je te libère de la tyrannie de la pensée. »
foreignData.name: Enjôleuse de volontés
foreignData.text: {T} : Acquérez le contrôle d'une créature ciblée ayant une force inférieure ou égale au nombre de créatures que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: "Vieni, lascia che io ti liberi dalla tirannia del pensiero."
foreignData.name: Seduttrice di Volontà
foreignData.text: {T}: Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o inferiore al numero di creature che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 「おいで。思考の暴虐から解き放ってあげましょう。」
foreignData.name: 意思の詐話師
foreignData.text: {T}：パワーがあなたがコントロールするクリーチャーの総数以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それのコントロールを得る。

foreignData.name: 의지를 현혹하는 자
foreignData.text: {T}: 당신이 조종하는 생물의 개수 이하의 공격력을 가진 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 당신이 그 생물을 조종한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Venha, deixe-me liberá-lo da tirania do pensamento."

foreignData.text: {T}: Ganhe o controle da criatura alvo com poder menor ou igual ao número de criaturas que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: «Пойдем, я освобожу тебя от жестокости разума».
foreignData.name: Обольстительница Воли
foreignData.text: {T}: получите контроль над целевым существом, сила которого меньше или равна количеству существ под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 「来吧，让我将你从思想的宰制中解放。」

foreignData.flavorText: 「來吧，讓我將你從思想的宰制中解放。」
foreignData.name: 惑志師
foreignData.text: {T}：獲得目標生物的操控權，且其力量需等於或小於由你操控的生物數量。

name: Beguiler of Wills
originalText: {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of creatures you control.

rulings.text: In order to activate the ability, you must be able to target a creature with power less than or equal to the number of creatures you control. The comparison is made again when the ability resolves. If the power is greater than the number of creatures you control at that time, the target is illegal and the ability doesn’t resolve.
The control-changing effect lasts indefinitely, even if the power of the creature becomes greater than the number of creatures you control after the ability resolves.

text: {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of creatures you control.
